snippet.title: Hot Shots Golf™: World Invitational (PS3) Announce Trailer
snippet.description:
The over-the-top golf franchise is coming to the PlayStation®3 system with added features and content!
- Full HD 
- Pre-loaded with characters Erika and Gloria and the Mt. Sakura and Mar Cielo courses - Supports PS Move motion controller for realistic golf swing 
- Slot mode to keep multi-player rounds competitive 
- Quick rounds on Par 3 courses 
- Shared online lobby with PS Vita version

©2013 Sony Computer Entertainment Inc. Hot Shots Golf and Hot Shots Golf: World Invitational are trademarks of Sony Computer Entertainment America LLC.
